name: Anuj Kaushik
course: 5 Yr. Integrated M.Tech in Mathematics & Computing
references: Co-Founders/CTOs of any of the companies mentioned in the CV (except Citrix of-course)

byteswan.name: Byteswan
byteswan.description: I work as a full-time director of engineering (limited term engagement) with early stage startups, doing whatever-it-takes to get them to their next stage. I contribute across : coding, hiring, people management, devops, dev-processes, strategy, product & design. I transition out once the product is stable and I’ve hired the right team including leadership, as needed.

aurva.name: Aurva
aurva.description: A seed stage startup building an enterprise data security product for US and India markets. Contributed on coding, architecture, product, design, hiring and micro-managing execution. Helped them close their first 5 big ticket enterprise customers.

doco.name: Doco
doco.description: Built V1 of their product, drove customer acquisition and got their TPV to 25L per month, enabling them to raise their seed round.

confidential_02.name: Confidential
confidential_02.description: Planning gig. Product, design, tech architecture, hiring plan, team budget, execution timelines.

durianpay.name: Durianpay
durianpay.description: A seed stage startup building a payment gateway for Indonesia. Led an engg team of 10-15 members split across bangalore and jakarta, contributing on architecture, people management, execution & hiring. Transitioned out once the right team and cadence was set in place.

aasthy.name: Aasthy
aasthy.description: Hired and led a small engineering team of 6 devs for an angel funded startup building a fractional real estate investment platform.

confidential_01.name: Confidential
confidential_01.description: Led a team of 3 contractors to deliver multiple small hyper casual games for an Indie game studio.

moonfrog.name: Moonfrog Labs
moonfrog.stack: Golang, Redshift, AWS, NodeJs, Cocos2Dx, Unity
descriptions: Contributions as EM : Led engineering for Moonfrog’s biggest game TPG (TeenPattiGold). Complete ownership of engg execution, processes, roadmap, live-ops and hiring. Game had 4M DAU, 11M MAU. Total org size reporting averaged around 25 (dev + devops). Owned org-wide engineering hiring. Revamped the engg hiring process. Upskilled high potential ICs to take up org wide roles and pod leads to replace me as an EM before transitioning out.

Contributions as SSE : Complete ownership of Moonfrog Analytics Infra. Scaled the ETL-Pipeline to ingest 2B to 12B events per day and the warehouse infra to handle approx 12 TB. Various other features like monitoring/throttling/alerting infra for ETL-pipeline, automated reports, anomaly alerts, on-Demand data loading/transfer infra, in-house dashboarding platform, real-time monitoring/alerting infra for game liveops. Made a long term roadmap, hired 3 engineers and handed it over to a new EM.

proptiger.name: Proptiger
descriptions: Complete ownership of Proptiger and Makaan search infrastructure. Improved the search CTR from 40% to 85%.
Scaled Proptiger Datalabs (B2B product for real-estate trend analysis) to support 20x more data.
Led the buyer-side part for the relaunch of makaan.com platform, after acquisition by Proptiger.

exarb.name: Exarb
exarb.description: Built an end-to-end trading suite aimed at F&O arbitrage in NSE/BSE markets. Owned the trader facing part of the suite: product + ui/ux + dev + devops + customer support. Products Developed: Fully featured trading terminal with market feeds, P&L calc, reporting; admin portal; tools for trade-log analysis, benchmarking, historic analysis, trader behavior analysis

citrix.name: Citrix
citrix.description: Extended GSLB (Global Server Load Balancing) stat aggregation from single box to a cluster for Citrix flagship product - NetScaler. Also, lots of character building maintenance work (250+ bug fixes and small features.).
